text: John Brisco Ray was an English diver who competed for England. ==Diving career== Ray won a gold medal in the 3 Metres Springboard at the 1934 British Empire Games in London. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1973 deaths Category:English male divers Category:Divers at the 1934 British Empire Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in diving Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for England
title: John Brisco Ray
